verses.verse: יֹ֭שֵׁב <S%H3427><s%> He that dwelleth בְּסֵ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in the secret עֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> place of the most High בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> under the shadow שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H3885><s%> shall abide

אֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> I will say לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מַחְסִ֣י <S%H4268><s%> [He is] my refuge וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י <S%H4686><s%> and my fortress אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> my God אֶבְטַח־ <S%H982><s%> in him will I trust בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> who יַ֭צִּֽילְךָ <S%H5337><s%> Surely he shall deliver מִפַּ֥ח <S%H6341><s%> thee from the snare יָק֗וּשׁ <S%H3353><s%> of the fowler מִדֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> pestilence הַוּֽוֹת׃ <S%H1942><s%> [and] from the noisome

בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ ׀ <S%H84><s%> thee with his feathers יָ֣סֶךְ <S%H5526><s%> He shall cover לָ֭ךְ וְתַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> and under כְּנָפָ֣יו <S%H3671><s%> and under his wings תֶּחְסֶ֑ה <S%H2620><s%> shalt thou trust צִנָּ֖ה <S%H6793><s%> [shall be thy] shield וְֽסֹחֵרָ֣ה <S%H5507><s%> and buckler אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H571><s%> his truth

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Thou shalt not be afraid מִפַּ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> for the terror לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ <S%H2671><s%> [nor] for the arrow יָע֥וּף <S%H5774><s%> [that] flieth יוֹמָֽם׃ <S%H3119><s%> by day

מִ֭דֶּבֶר <S%H1698><s%> [Nor] for the pestilence בָּאֹ֣פֶל <S%H652><s%> in darkness יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [that] walketh מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב <S%H6986><s%> [nor] for the destruction יָשׁ֥וּד <S%H7736><s%> [that] wasteth צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> at noonday

יִפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall מִצִּדְּךָ֨ ׀ <S%H6654><s%> at thy side אֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> A thousand וּרְבָבָ֥ה <S%H7233><s%> and ten thousand מִימִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> at thy right hand אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> about לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִגָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H5066><s%> [but] it shall not come nigh

רַ֭ק <S%H7535><s%> with בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ <S%H5869><s%> Only with thine eyes תַבִּ֑יט <S%H5027><s%> shalt thou behold וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת <S%H8011><s%> the reward רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> and see

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מַחְסִ֑י <S%H4268><s%> [which is] my refuge עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> [even] the most High שַׂ֣מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> Because thou hast made מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4583><s%> thy habitation

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No תְאֻנֶּ֣ה <S%H579><s%> befall אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> There shall no evil וְ֝נֶ֗גַע <S%H5061><s%> thee neither shall any plague לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> come nigh בְּאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H168><s%> thy dwelling

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מַ֭לְאָכָיו <S%H4397><s%> For he shall give his angels יְצַוֶּה־ <S%H6680><s%> charge לָּ֑ךְ לִ֝שְׁמָרְךָ֗ <S%H8104><s%> over thee to keep בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1870><s%> thee in all thy ways

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in כַּפַּ֥יִם <S%H3709><s%> in [their] hands יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ <S%H5375><s%> They shall bear thee up פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תִּגֹּ֖ף <S%H5062><s%> lest thou dash בָּאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> against a stone רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7272><s%> thy foot

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon שַׁ֣חַל <S%H7826><s%> upon the lion וָפֶ֣תֶן <S%H6620><s%> and adder תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ <S%H1869><s%> Thou shalt tread תִּרְמֹ֖ס <S%H7429><s%> shalt thou trample under feet כְּפִ֣יר <S%H3715><s%> the young lion וְתַנִּֽין׃ <S%H8577><s%> and the dragon

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because בִ֣י חָ֭שַׁק <S%H2836><s%> Because he hath set his love וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <S%H6403><s%> upon me therefore will I deliver אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ <S%H7682><s%> him I will set him on high כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> because he hath known שְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> my name

יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי ׀ <S%H7121><s%> He shall call וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ <S%H6030><s%> upon me and I will answer עִמּֽוֹ־ <S%H5973><s%> will be with אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> him בְצָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> him I [will be] with him in trouble אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ <S%H2502><s%> I will deliver וַֽאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H3513><s%> him and honour
אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> With long יָ֭מִים <S%H3117><s%> life אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7646><s%> will I satisfy וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ <S%H7200><s%> him and shew בִּֽישׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <S%H3444><s%> him my salvation
